Package org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction

This package contains all the classes related to the public transaction API, as well as the main TransactionManager implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Transaction
    Represents a transaction in the XFlat database.
    TransactionListener
    A Listener for Transaction Events.
    TransactionManager
    The TransactionManager opens transactions and manages their lifecycle.
    TransactionScope
    Represents a TransactionScope.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ThreadContextTransactionManager
    A TransactionManager that uses the current thread as the context for transactions.
    TransactionEventObject
    an EventObject for Transaction events.
    TransactionOptions
    An object representing the options that can be applied to a transaction.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Isolation
    Enumerates the different transaction isolation levels supported in XFlat.
    Propagation
    Represents the different propagation behavior for a transaction.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalTransactionStateException
    An exception that occurs on an attempt to commit or roll back a transaction that has already been resolved.
    TransactionException
    The base class for all exceptions that are related to transactions.
    TransactionPropagationException  
    WriteConflictException
    This exception is thrown when a write conflict occurs upon committing a transaction.

Package org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction Description

This package contains all the classes related to the public transaction API, as well as the main TransactionManager implementations.
